alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 3:01AM MST until December 02 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
